mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.alias AS "alias", a.category AS "category", a.entity_id AS "entityId", a.origin_name AS "originName", a.mime AS "mime", a.path AS "path", a.upload_by AS "uploadBy", a.upload_date AS "uploadDate", a.expire_date AS "expireDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_upload( id, alias, category, entity_id, origin_name, mime, path, upload_by, upload_date, expire_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{alias}, #{category}, #{entityId}, #{originName}, #{mime}, #{path}, #{uploadBy}, #{uploadDate}, #{expireDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_upload SET alias = #{alias}, category = #{category}, entity_id = #{entityId}, origin_name = #{originName}, mime = #{mime}, path = #{path}, upload_by = #{uploadBy}, upload_date = #{uploadDate}, expire_date = #{expireDate} WHERE id = #{id}
